creditline: Gift of Michele Beiny in memory of her grandfather Hanns Weinberg
description: small, straight-sided cup with scroll handle and saucer decorated with tiny sprigs of forget-me-nots in blue with yellow centers and green leaves; scattered sprigs in gold. Gilt dentil rims.
markings: Marks: interlaced L\'S gilder\'s mark: LL-Leclot painter\'s mark: e.c. (Pierre Ainé)
medium: Soft-past procelain with enamel and gilded decoration
title: Saucer
